dmca.title: Intellectual Property Violation
dmca.body:
Date: Tue, 8 May 2007 23:06:42 -0400
From: Michael Fread <shaitand@gmail.com>
Reply-To: shaitan@linuxcrusader.com
To: infringe@iecc.com
Subject: Intellectual Property Violation

Michael Fread
9021 SW 156TH ST #107
Palmetto Bay, FL 33157

You appear to be distributing the access key for a number of copyrighted
works to which I own the copyright. These poems include "The Sunrise" and
"Alone at Last..." and are distributed with a copy protection mechanism. The
encrypted files may be distributed but in order to view the poems one must
purchase the access key 'Microsoft'. Publishing this key allows anyone who
views it to bypass my copy protection mechanism and is a violation of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998. Please remove the access key from
all online documents in which you publish it.

You may not have been aware that you were infringing. As an alternative, you
may send a Cashiers Check or Money Order in the amount of $500 to me in
order to purchase the perpetual and retroactive right to publish the access
key. You may also send a Cashiers Check or Money Order in the amount of
$2000 in order to purchase the perpetual and retroactive right to to publish
the access key for yourself and any third parties that publish material
using your equipment.

As of 5/2/2007, a list of some of the pages containing infringing content
can be found at:

http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&safe=off&q=microsoft+site%3Aabuse.net&btnG=Search




I swear under penalty of perjury that I have a good faith belief that these
materials violate my intellectual property rights and that I am authorized
to act for the copyright holder.

Michael Fread
Poet
shaitand@gmail.com
